xp_award_guidelines.discovering_treasure: Award 1–1000 XP based on value or risk.
xp_award_guidelines.advancing_story: Award 25–500 XP based on narrative progress.

distribution.default: XP is split equally among the party.
distribution.individual_bonus: Referee may award individual XP for exceptional actions or risks.

bonuses.prime_attribute: Grants XP bonus based on class.
bonuses.wisdom_charisma_bonus: Characters with Wisdom or Charisma 13+ receive an additional XP bonus.
